Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillcrest Drive, between the Regalia Convent and the Odgen House.
Room.LongDescription: The Odgen House is located on the north side of the road and is one of the older family houses in the city. On the south side of the road, you can see the Regalia Convent building. It is a large, white building with many statues and other marble sculptures to scare away the evil spirits that may accompany the people of the wrong faith.
